title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example, resizing the window in the vertical direction causes all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames to flash. This is unexpected behavior.
OB: Resize the window in the vertical direction in the Control Example. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When resizing the window, only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted. The tabs in the TabFolder should not flash.
SR:
1. Launch the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
